descriptionHTML:
Model Number: FR-A06

A Classic Wearable Watchface for Classic Audience

Keep up with the times with this futuristic and fashionable analogue watch design. This watch face combines high precision with style and elegance. This elegant analogue design is loaded with a variety of option to ease your way and making you look at your watch from time to time.

• Analogue view of time and Date
• Beautiful blue background
• Remaining battery life of your device so you exactly know when to charge

This contemporary toned Watchface is designed for all round and square display watches so you can use it with Moto 360, G watch, Samsung Gear Live.

How it works
It’s simple just download the app to your smartphone and sync it with the watch. The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen.
comments: Rolex watch style this design so look like one of design in rolex. cool
